<title>Chapter and Verse | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/chapter-and-verse/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Chapter and Verse" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Chapter and Verse is the musical companion to Bruce Springsteen's autobiography 'Born To Run.' The album is a collection of 18 songs chosen by Springsteen that trace his musical history from its earliest days and tell a story that parallels the one in the book. Chapter and Verse includes five previously unreleased tracks including two tracks from The Castiles, featuring a teenaged Springsteen on guitar and vocals." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/chapter-and-verse/" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />

The album is a collection of 18 songs chosen by Springsteen that trace his musical history from its earliest days and tell a story that parallels the one in the book. Chapter and Verse includes five previously unreleased tracks including two tracks from The Castiles, featuring a teenaged Springsteen on guitar and vocals." />

yoast_head_json.title: Chapter and Verse | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.og_description: Chapter and Verse is the musical companion to Bruce Springsteen's autobiography 'Born To Run.' The album is a collection of 18 songs chosen by Springsteen that trace his musical history from its earliest days and tell a story that parallels the one in the book. Chapter and Verse includes five previously unreleased tracks including two tracks from The Castiles, featuring a teenaged Springsteen on guitar and vocals.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Chapter and Verse is the musical companion to Bruce Springsteen's autobiography 'Born To Run.' The album is a collection of 18 songs chosen by Springsteen that trace his musical history from its earliest days and tell a story that parallels the one in the book. Chapter and Verse includes five previously unreleased tracks including two tracks from The Castiles, featuring a teenaged Springsteen on guitar and vocals.
